items.sentence: Tom certainly wasn\'t at home when we went to visit him.
Tom hasn\'t slept at all since the day before yesterday.
Tom wrote Mary\'s phone number in his little black book.
Tom\'s eyes gradually became accustomed to the darkness.
Tom\'s family disapproved of his relationship with Mary.
Tom\'s parents returned a day early from their vacation.
Tom\'s son was killed in a traffic accident last winter.
You\'re never going to find a better boyfriend than Tom.
Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the station?
Tom didn\'t tell me that what we were doing was illegal.
